bug.author: robmarkcole
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h1>Summary</denchmark-h>
I have installed (version="0.47.2") in develop mode using pip install -e . and get the following error on attempting to run streamlit (with any command): <denchmark-code>(base) Robins-MacBook-Pro:~ robincole$ streamlit hello Traceback (most recent call last): File "//anaconda3/bin/streamlit", line 11, in <module> load_entry_point('streamlit', 'console_scripts', 'streamlit')() File "//anaconda3/lib/python3.7/site-packages/pkg_resources/__init__.py", line 489, in load_entry_point return get_distribution(dist).load_entry_point(group, name) File "//anaconda3/lib/python3.7/site-packages/pkg_resources/__init__.py", line 2843, in load_entry_point return ep.load() File "//anaconda3/lib/python3.7/site-packages/pkg_resources/__init__.py", line 2434, in load return self.resolve() File "//anaconda3/lib/python3.7/site-packages/pkg_resources/__init__.py", line 2440, in resolve module = __import__(self.module_name, fromlist=['__name__'], level=0) File "/Users/robincole/Documents/GitHub/streamlit/lib/streamlit/__init__.py", line 96, in <module> from streamlit.DeltaGenerator import DeltaGenerator as _DeltaGenerator File "/Users/robincole/Documents/GitHub/streamlit/lib/streamlit/DeltaGenerator.py", line 35, in <module> from streamlit.proto import Balloons_pb2 ImportError: cannot import name 'Balloons_pb2' from 'streamlit.proto' (/Users/robincole/Documents/GitHub/streamlit/lib/streamlit/proto/__init__.py) </denchmark-code>
<denchmark-h:h1>Debug info</denchmark-h>
Streamlit version: (get it with $ streamlit version) Python version: (get it with $ python --version) Using Conda? PipEnv? PyEnv? Pex? OS version: Browser version:

comments.comment:
Hey <denchmark-link:https://github.com/robmarkcole>@robmarkcole</denchmark-link>
Could you follow the instructions on <denchmark-link:https://github.com/streamlit/streamlit/wiki/Contributing>https://github.com/streamlit/streamlit/wiki/Contributing</denchmark-link> to install Streamlit in develop mode? In particular the make all-devel command will generate the protobufs for you which will get rid of that error.

HI <denchmark-link:https://github.com/jrhone>@jrhone</denchmark-link>
I was able to run through all the steps without error. Cheers!
What was the solution for it?
